Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to the imposition of sales and compensating use tax in Schenectady county
Summary: Relates to the imposition of sales and compensating use tax in Schenectady county; extends such authority until November 30, 2027.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to extending the imposition of a sales and compensating use tax in Schenectady county
